ST16-001.name: Uta ST16-001
ST16-001.effect: [Blocker] [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may trash 1 {FILM} type card from your hand: Give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader or 1 of your Characters.

ST16-002.name: Gordon ST16-002
ST16-002.effect: [Blocker] [On Your Opponent's Attack] You may trash any number of {Music} type cards from your hand. Your Leader or 1 of your Characters gains +1000 power during this battle for every card trashed.

ST16-003.name: Charlotte Katakuri ST16-003
ST16-003.effect: If your Leader has the {FILM} type and you have 6 or more rested cards, this Character gains +2000 power.

ST16-004.name: Shanks ST16-004
ST16-004.effect: [On Play] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters.

ST16-005.name: Monkey D. Luffy ST16-005
ST16-005.effect: If you have a rested [Uta], this Character gains +1000 power.
